The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Crimson swift
Crimson swift
Released21 November 2006 (Update)
Combat level1
MembersYes
LocationFeldip Hunter area
ExamineThis bird obviously doesn't believe in subtlety.
Advanced data
NPC ID5549

The crimson swift is a red bird captured with bird snares, requiring 1 Hunter, yielding 34 Hunter experience, bones, raw bird meat and 5-10 red feathers.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Hunter info
  • 3 Description
  • 4 Hunting technique
    • 4.1 Multiple traps
  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)

Hunter info[edit | edit source]

Crimson swift
Level required 1
Hunter XP34 xp
RetaliationNo
TrapBird snare
Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always770
Raw bird meat1Always2710
Red feather5–10Always50–10030–60

The catch rate is 39% at lvl 1 and 164% at lvl 99.[1]

Description[edit | edit source]

Parts of this article are copyrighted by Jagex.
It has a direct quote, copied verbatim, from Old School RuneScape or the Old School RuneScape website.
“ The crimson swift is a tropical bird that typically lives in dense jungle areas. Subtlety is not one of this bird's strong points, its striking red plumage ensuring it will be visible wherever it goes, making it a popular first bird for hunters and spotters alike. ”
 
— William Oddity's Guide to the Avian

Hunting technique[edit | edit source]

A crimson swift being caught.

Set up a bird snare and wait until a bird gets caught. The same bird snare may be reused.

Bird snares are available for purchase in Hunter shops, obtained with the Hunter Kit spell in the lunar spellbook or from the south-western most crate of the Land's End bank.

Multiple traps[edit | edit source]

Bird snaring can be done with multiple traps at once, with the maximum number of traps depending on the player's Hunter level.

Traps
1 1
20 2
40 3
60 4
80 5
